locations.name: One Farrer Hotel
locations.description:
Sleek hotel complex above Farrer Park metro, 4 km from Chinatown, 6 km from Botanic Gardens. Modern rooms, free Wi-Fi, dining variety, pool, spa, gym, chocolate shop, meeting space.

Check-in: 15:00
Check-out: 12:00.

locations.name: Carlton Hotel Singapore
locations.description:
Luxury hotel, 7-min walk to Suntec Convention Centre, 5-min to Bras Basah metro. Elegant rooms with free Wi-Fi, city views, three dining options, pool, spa, gym.

Check-in time: 14:00
Check-out time: 12:00.

locations.name: Conrad Centennial Singapore
locations.description:
8 km from Universal Studios SG, sophisticated rooms with city views. Suites include free Wi-Fi, coffeemakers. Dining options, spa, gym, outdoor pool, and breakfast (extra fee).

Check-in time: 15:00
Check-out time: 12:00.

locations.name: Pan Pacific Serviced Suites Beach Road, Singapore
locations.description:
Pan Pacific Serviced Suites Beach Road, 4-star Kallang aparthotel, 15 mins to Bugis Street, Suntec Center. 180 rooms, pool, Wi-Fi, fitness, parking.

Check-in time: 15:00
Check-out time: 00:00.

locations.name: Pan Pacific, Singapore
locations.description:
Upscale business hotel near Marina Bay and Promenade MRT offers polished rooms with glass-enclosed bathrooms, free Wi-Fi, flat-screens, minibars, and suites with balconies. Dining options include Japanese, Chinese, and Indian. Amenities feature a spa, gym, outdoor pool, and 24/7 room service.

Check-in time: 15:00
Check-out time: 12:00.

locations.name: ParkRoyal Collection Marina Bay
locations.description:
In the CBD, 11 min from Esplanade/Theatres on the Bay, 2 km from National Museum. Elegant rooms, bay/city views, free WiFi, dining, outdoor pool, gym, spa.

Check-in time: 15:00
Check-out time: 12:00.

locations.name: Oasia Hotel Novena
locations.description:
A 2-minute walk from Novena metro station, this upscale hotel is 3 km from Orchard Road and 5 km from the Central Business District. Polished rooms with contemporary decor offer Wi-Fi, flat-screen TVs, and high-end linens. Amenities include a fitness center, hot tub, outdoor pool, and a modern bistro.

Check-in time: 14:00
Check-out time: 12:00.

locations.name: Studio M
locations.description:
14-min walk from Chinatown metro, contemporary high-rise hotel, 3 km from Marina Bay Sands. Streamlined rooms, sleeping lofts, lap pool, cafe, gym, free parking (subject to availability).

Check-in time: 15:00
Check-out time: 11:00.

locations.name: Shangri-La Singapore
locations.description:
Nestled within 15 acres of gardens, this opulent hotel, situated 6 km from Marina Bay Sands and 2.3 km from Singapore Botanic Gardens, offers lavish rooms, multiple dining choices, an outdoor pool, tennis courts, and a deluxe spa.

Check-in time: 15:00
Check-out time: 12:00.
